metadata.title: CVE-2017-9742 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The score_opcodes function in opcodes/score7-dis.c in GNU Binutils 2.28allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (buffer overflow andapplication crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a craftedbinary file, as demonstrated by mishandling of this file during "objdump-D" execution.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
